Nice I got the original Rome Total War bought and i want to play Lord Of The Rings Total War but i cant find it anywhere in my country Estonia so i downloaded this now :) so far so good install works i just need this for the LOTRTW mod.

I made an instruction how to install this and well it worked on me :).
1.Download This#
2.Extract the RAR and the other files all in one place in your computer#
3.Use Daemon Tools or Alcohol or what you have on the mount image.
4.Complete the instructions and wait for the install to finish
5.Goto my computer and click open with your right mouse button and you should see the crack folder.
5.Cop the crack to the main RTW folder and replace the crack with the original one.
6.There now have fun and play :).
NB!THIS WORKED FOR ME AND GAME WORKS 100% AND I HAVENT DOWNLOADED PATCHES OR ANYTHING

OK, just spent the last 30 min trying  to get this to work. I'm stuck trying to get patch 1.5 to work. Patch 1.3 installed just fine after deleting the files in the InstallShield folder. But when I try to install Patch 1.5, it says that it needs patch 1.3. Patch 1.3 is already installed and is in the Program Files folder of Rome Total War. Forums on Total War have no solution to this problem as nowhere else, anyone know of any? any help is greatly appreciated.

*note: do we really have to pricks to people who are new to downloading and configuring games off the internet. Don't be an asshole, instead of being one, why not help them out?
JxNe, you have to uninstall 1.3 patch and then install it again. Then, install 1.5. If you get the message after uninstalling 1.3 saying if you want to uninstall RTW, click no or cancel, whatever.
